Package com.rexsl.core

Core artifact of ReXSL framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExceptionTrap
    All uncaught exceptions will be caught here.
    RestfulServlet
    The only and the main servlet from ReXSL framework.
    XslResolver
    Provider of JAXB Marshaller for JAX-RS framework.
    XsltFilter
    Converts XML to XHTML, if necessary.

Package com.rexsl.core Description

Core artifact of ReXSL framework.

Read Introduction to ReXSL to get better understanding of how it works.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.rexsl.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.rexsl</groupId>
   <artifactId>rexsl-core</artifactId>
 </dependency>
Version:
$Id$
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
See Also:
Introduction to ReXSL, project site
